title: WA Robot Approve Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot approve <code>'. Validates and consumes approval tokens.

code.description: The approval code that was submitted

valid.description: Whether the approval code was valid and consumed

action_kind.description: The action type this approval was for (e.g., 'send_text', 'workflow_run')

pane_id.description: The pane ID the approval was scoped to (null if not pane-specific)

expires_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the approval would have expired

consumed_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the approval was consumed (present when valid=true)

error_reason.description: Why the approval failed (present when valid=false)

action_fingerprint.description: Hash of the action this approval was issued for
